name: Kozilek's Shrieker
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{C}: Kozilek's Shrieker gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. {C} represents colorless mana.)

rulings.text: If Kozilek’s Shrieker gains menace after it’s been legally blocked by one creature, it will remain blocked.
Multiple instances of menace on the same creature are redundant.
